TopicTitle: The Elene, easy plane to fly (sort of)

Articles.Content:
The Elene is pretty easy, if you don\'t count the take off. 

It\'s high maneuverability makes it a bit difficult for movement if you punch the movement. This is why a joystick is HIGHLY recommended for this. Mainly, don\'t punch the movement. It\'s big wings allow the maneuverability, while a lot of control surfaces exist on it. Remember, don\'t punch the movement.

If you move the rear wheels forward more, it should be easier to take off.

> 
> If you move the rear wheels forward more, it should be easier to take off.

It\'s not that, it\'s due to when it actually gets off the ground. It likes to be a bit unstable, but really, you can take off once you get the hang of it.
Might be because you have too many lifting surfaces forward of the center of gravity. Try adding a few structural tanks behind the cockpit.
